text:
config.status is broken in VPATH builds since it lacks the code from the end
of the configure script which munges the Makefiles to add -I$(srcdir)/...
arguments using sed.

(the Makefiles produced by running config.status hence don't find the headers
from srcdir)
creator: joe@manyfish.co.uk

text: Fixed on APR HEAD courtesy of shiny new build system, thanks Greg.
creator: jorton@redhat.com
